params.description: Removed non‑applicable subsets of the published datasets: diseased samples or samples expressing disease‑associated mutations (refs. 14–16,18,19,26), fused organoids (ref. 1), primary fetal data (refs. 10,23), hormone‑treated samples (ref. 22), data collected before neural induction (refs. 3,20) and share‑seq data (ref. 23).
